snippet: Ms. Lea was a jazz-influenced cabaret singer known for her subtle interpretations of classic American popular songs.
abstract: Barbara Lea, cabaret singer who began her career in the mid-1950s, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Lea was a jazz-influenced cabaret singer known for her subtle interpretations of classic American popular songs.

headline.seo: Barbara Lea, Interpreter of American Popular Songs, Dies
headline.main: Barbara Lea, Cabaret Singer, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Barbara Lea, Cabaret Singer, Dies at 82
